Class Zombie

java.lang.Object
Zombie
public class Zombie extends Object
Represents a Zombie in the game, defining its movement, attack behavior, and health. Zombies advance towards the player's house and attack plants in their path.
Since:
2025-06-27

  • Constructor Details

    • Zombie

      public Zombie(int laneNo, int tileNo, Armor armor)
      Constructs a new Zombie object. Initializes the zombie's stats, health, and starting position. Equips the provided armor if any.
      Parameters:
      laneNo - The lane index (row) the zombie will occupy.
      tileNo - The tile index (column) the zombie will occupy.
      armor - The Armor object to equip, or null for no armor.

  • Method Details

    • equipArmor

      public void equipArmor()
      Equips armor to the zombie, modifying its type and speed based on the armor's properties.

    • move

      public void move()
      Moves the zombie to the previous tile (towards the player's house). Carries over any fractional position to maintain smooth movement.

    • isReadyToMove

      public boolean isReadyToMove(double elapsedTime)
      Checks if the zombie is ready to move to the next tile based on its speed and elapsed time. Updates the zombie's position.
      Parameters:
      elapsedTime - The time elapsed since the last update.
      Returns:
      true if the zombie has crossed a tile boundary and is ready to move to the next tile; false otherwise.

    • isReadyToAttack

      public boolean isReadyToAttack(double timeElapsed)
      Checks if the zombie is ready to perform an attack based on its attack speed and elapsed time. Updates the internal attack cooldown timer.
      Parameters:
      timeElapsed - The time elapsed since the last update.
      Returns:
      true if the zombie's attack cooldown has finished; false otherwise.

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Checks if the zombie is still alive (health is greater than or equal to 0).
      Returns:
      true if the zombie is alive; false otherwise.

    • attack

      public void attack(Plant p)
      Makes the zombie attack a given plant, inflicting damage. Prints a message to the console detailing the attack.
      Parameters:
      p - The Plant to be attacked.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Applies damage to the zombie. If the zombie has hittable armor, damage is applied to the armor first. If armor breaks, its remaining damage carries over to the zombie's health. Updates the zombie's state after taking damage.
      Parameters:
      damage - The amount of damage to inflict.

    • updateState

      public void updateState(String stateType)
      Updates the visual state of the zombie based on its current health and armor status. The state determines which animation frames are displayed.
      Parameters:
      stateType - The base state type (e.g., "walk", "eat").

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition(double elapsedTime)
      Updates the zombie's position based on its speed and elapsed time. This method continuously moves the zombie within its current tile.
      Parameters:
      elapsedTime - The time elapsed since the last update.

    • updateAttackCooldown

      public void updateAttackCooldown(double timeElapsed)
      Updates the internal cooldown timer for the zombie's attacks.
      Parameters:
      timeElapsed - The time elapsed since the last update.

    • resetAttackCooldown

      public void resetAttackCooldown(double cd)
      Resets the zombie's attack cooldown, allowing for precise control over attack timing.
      Parameters:
      cd - The new cooldown value to set.

    • resetPosition

      public void resetPosition(double p)
      Resets the zombie's position within its current tile.
      Parameters:
      p - The new position value.

    • getPosition

      public double getPosition()
      Returns the current fractional position of the zombie within its tile.
      Returns:
      The zombie's position (0.0 to Tile.getTileLength()).

    • getSpeed

      public double getSpeed()
      Returns the current movement speed of the zombie.
      Returns:
      The zombie's speed.

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Returns the current health of the zombie.
      Returns:
      The zombie's health.

    • getTileNo

      public int getTileNo()
      Returns the current tile index (column) the zombie is occupying.
      Returns:
      The zombie's tile number.

    • getLaneNo

      public int getLaneNo()
      Returns the current lane index (row) the zombie is occupying.
      Returns:
      The zombie's lane number.

    • inLastTile

      public boolean inLastTile()
      Checks if the zombie is currently in the first tile of the game board (closest to the house).
      Returns:
      true if the zombie is in the first tile; false otherwise.

    • getState

      public String getState()
      Returns the current state of the zombie.
      Returns:
      The zombie's state string.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Returns the type of the zombie.
      Returns:
      The zombie's type string.

    • getSize

      public double getSize()
      Returns the visual size or scale of the zombie.
      Returns:
      The zombie's size.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Provides a string representation of the zombie's current stats (health, speed, damage).
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A formatted string with zombie statistics.
